DeliveryAddress.AddressLine: A-702, Shree Sai Tower Kamlakar Nagar Ambernath west

StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
• A result driven professional with a decade of work experience in Project Management & Implementation, Pre-Sales, Business Analysis, Client Servicing and Product Training in IT industry.
• Proficient in project planning & execution for development &implementation activities.
• Tracking and Monitoring IT portfolio health.
• Strong client focus in building & maintaining healthy business relations and ensuring high customer satisfaction matrices by performing pre sales activities.
• Onsite Experience in product implementation & Product training in international market with in financial service industry.
• Efficient in implementation & manage client deliveries of trading solution as account manager.
• Skilled in building & maintaining healthy relations with team &potential clients to ensure customer satisfaction.
• Experience in documenting business& functional requirements, process flow diagrams.
• Functional knowledge in financial products like Equities, Derivatives, Fixed Income, Commodity derivatives, FX.
• Quick learner with an ability to rapidly achieve organizational integration.
• Ability to work effectively with internal & external stakeholders.
• Excellent interpersonal, communication, organizational, and project management skills.
• Works on project management tool.

PositionHistory.Description:
Work Profile
• IT Portfolio planning for John Deere Financial services
• Scope management for IT portfolio.
• Lesion with regional IT leads for project requirements and portfolio planning.
• Review all project plans and monitoring project health in terms of schedule &budget.
• Managing leadership expectation by providing Project Reports like Status report, Milestone reports for all the projects
• Implementing guidelines for monitoring health of IT portfolio and its projects.
• Preparing Dashboard for IT Portfolio & operation review for leadership.
• Consolidate & prepare monthly operations review presentation for leadership.
• Work of MS- Project and Project management tools to analyze project health and prepare MIS reports for all project of portfolio.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 33% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Liaison
PositionHistory.Description:
Role: Implementation & Account Management
Work Profile:
• Product Implementation of Bloomberg Trading Solution (SSEOMS ) in INDIA and PHILIPPINES
• Project Management for end to end implementation of SSEOMS application.
• Prepare project plan and execute accordingly.
• Requirement gathering & analysis and prepare documents accordingly.
• Communication with internal and external stakeholders.
• Liaison with multiple teams for managing projects.
• Monitoring project status and prepare &maintain MIS document for Project management activities.
• Integration of front office, middle office & back office to automate workflow.
• Product training to existing client and new clients.
• Learn new functionality of product and implement it in client'sproduction environments.
• Oversee the User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and launch of the products releases & new versions and Inform client on regular basis.
• UAT and Production testing for technical go live and business go live.
• Coordinator between Product team& client. This includes understanding business requirements, effort estimation, drafting business requirement specifications.
Highlights:
• Implementedproject for trading solution in INDIA, PHILIPPINES, HONG KONG and SINGAPORE market.
• Implemented project for trade reporting for Philippines market to report trades to stock exchange.
• ManagedBack office files migration project at client side.
• Managed front office, middle office and back office user's expectation and implemented workflow to optimize business operation.

Project: SSEOMS implementation (Migration Project)
Description: SSEOMS is an ASP electronic trading solution for investments banks, Institutional agency broking houses. It was migration projectwith customized features &functionalities to increase the efficiency of trading & operational activities for three countries.Client gets real time information and ability to manage business including:
• Receives & manages orders from multiple domestic and international buyside clients.
• Optimize workflow for trading and back office operation with integrating 3rd party application.
• Onboard and manage multiple buyside clients over FIX connection.

Project: NOE (Notification of Execution)
Description: NOE is an electronic trading application which is fully integrated with SSEOMS. It was used for reporting trade executions of offline orders to buyside trading application. It has advantage for both buyside and sellside users including.
• It sends real time execution information of offline order via FIX connectivity.
• Clients can amend, cancel and execution orders and its send info to buyside client.
• It is integrated with SSEOMS and 3rd party application for order management.

Project: Trade Reporting (TR)
Description: TR application is used for reporting cross orders executions to Philippines stock exchange. This application has advantage including.
• Fully integrated with SSEOMS application.
• Client gets alert & view which orders are eligible for crossing.
• Client gets time based alert to report executed cross orders.

Project: SSEOMS Integration.
Description: This project is fully integrated & customized for multiple countries in APAC. Client uses SSEOMS application main application for receiving orders and distributing to respective countries trades for execution and it has including ability:
• Integrate to local trading application over FIX protocol.
• Integrated with client's treasury application.
• Receives orders from multiple buysideclients and distribute to respective countries users.
• Integrated with client's middle & back office application to get real time P&L and commission calculations.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 37% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Product Implementation, Pre-Sales, Business Analysis
PositionHistory.Description:
Product Training & Account management.
Work Profile:
• Project Management &end to end implementation activities of Trading Application.
• Understand client's business & functional requirement and prepare documents (BRD & FSD).
• Monitoring project status & prepare & maintain MIS document for Project management activities.
• Liaison with cross functional departments.
• Interface with the systems team for the product development for capital, derivative and currency market.
• Work closely with the Exchanges (NSE/BSE/NCDEX) members to serve their requirements related to CTCL/IBT/Mobile trading.
• Oversee the products releases on as per schedule and inform client for the same.
• UAT and Production testing for technical go live and business go live.
• Training dealers, clients and RMS teams of the Trading member on functional and technical usage of the software.
• Handholding to clients in implementing the platform across geographies and hierarchies.

Highlights:
• Managed project implementation of trading application (NSE-NOW, AlgoNomics, TradeGenie).
• Manages multiple projects of trading for external clients.
• Prepared project plan and executed it for increasing concurrent login & usage thereby contributing to more than 10% of the turnover of NSE on NOW application.
• Nominated as Star performer for the year 2009.
Project:NSE-NOW
Description: NSE-NOW is an ASP trading solution which provides online and offline trading. It is provided to NSE members to optimize trading workflow and increase business reach geographically. It provides real-time information& advantage including:
• Real-time market data (Stock price)& P&L of the day.
• Placing orders to NSE and monitor status.
• Workflow optimization with integrating middle office, back office& payment gateways.
• Provides access to end client of broking houses of online trading platform
• Provides real time risk management.

Project: AlgoNomics
Description: AlgoNomics is an algo trading application for broking houses with pre defined algo strategies. It is high performance and low latency trading application.  It provides real time access to broking houses with including advantages:
• Real time market data of NSE and BSE stock prices & differences.
• AlgoNomics Trader WorkStation enables traders to seamlessly create and monitor trading strategies.
• Real time risk management and monitoring of placed orders.
• Provide flexibility to host infrastructure at exchange premises.

Project: TradeGenie
Description: TradeGenie is a quant based (Charting based) trading application for broking houses. Trader can customized strategies with charting indicators. It provides access of real time information including:
• Buy or Sell signals of strategies.
• Provide flexibility to place orders manually or automatically as an when signal generate.
• Real-time market data (Stock price) and monitor status of orders including P&L of the day.
• Real time risk management and monitoring of placed orders.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 42% of this job

sov:PositionHistoryUserArea.sov:NormalizedTitle: Product Implementation Pre Sales Business Analysis

PositionHistory.Title: Pre-Sales, Business Analysis & Account management
PositionHistory.Description:
Work Profile:
• Responsible to perform business analyst role to implement required features in trading solution as per Indian market.
• Gather market intelligence and valuable information to compete and penetrate the trading product.
• Responsible for promoting International market trading solution and info vending solution to Indian broking houses.
• Gap analysis between our trading products and competitors trading solution.
• Responsible for UAT testing the trading product.
• Training and demonstration for trading product and Risk Management system to Indian broking house.

Highlights:
• Successfully implemented trading solution at Reliance Money.
• Successfully implemented info vending terminals at broking houses.

JobCategory.Comments: QA and QC describes 30% of this job

sov:PositionHistoryUserArea.sov:NormalizedTitle: Pre Sales Business Analysis AND Account management

PositionHistory.Title: Pre-Sales, Business Analysis & Account management
PositionHistory.Description:
Work Profile:
• Responsible pre sales and BA activity for Trading Application.
• Perform BA role to understand clients business & functional requirement and prepare document accordingly.
• Product training and demonstration of trading product and Risk Management system to Indian broking house.
• Knowledge of exchange documentation and audit process for product approval.
• Oversee documentation for compliance for new application for Internet based trading approval from NSE and BSE.

Highlights:
• Successfully collected client's requirements and Prepared document for trading online and offline trading.
• Implemented payment gateway requirements for online trading client.
• Collect business requirement for financial web portal for Mutual fund and IPO.
• Managed project implementation of financial website for client.

sov:PositionHistoryUserArea.sov:NormalizedTitle: Pre Sales Business Analysis AND Account management

Degree.Comments: • Masters of Marketing Management from Pune University in 2007.
• PGDBM from Indira School of management Studies, Pune in 2007.
• B.E. in Computer Science from Rajasthan University in year 2004.
